EmailTemplate.subject: Adjustable Rate Loans - Now available for {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We've been listening to your feedback!
BlueWave will now be providing an Adjustable Rate Loan to our Loyal Blue Partners to improve your customer conversion rates. Lower than Market Rates for the first 5 years of the loan reduce the total cost of ownership for customers and provide a faster path to ownership.
Additional Customer Benefits provided by BlueWave Financing:
Interest-Only Payments for 18 months: Upfront savings with interest-only payments following the installation period. No Money Down: Customers make no payments until after your system's installation period No Penalties for Early Repayment: Pay off your loan early for additional savings. Online, Automated Bill-Pay: We make signing up and managing loans seamless & secure. Personal Support: Best in class service from BlueWave Customer Care.
Are you interested in providing Adjustable Rate Loans? Please contact your BlueWave Partner to learn about eligibility.
Thank you for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere! - All of us here at BlueWave
